text:
Ginetta | Switzerland, Zurich | Javascript / CSS / HTML / Frontend | Full-time

You have to be eligible to work in Switzerland. Salary ranges around 7000 CHF / month after taxes (yes after taxes).

We hire for two roles (1. modular CSS/HTML, 2. Javascript). Tell us what you'd be interested in!

Your code reflects your consideration for both end users and fellow developers. You are familiar with the latest web technologies, such as node, angular, grunt, bower, karma, protractor, selenium, sass

Web development is an integral part of our design process. Simplicity, modularity and reusability are some of our core values. We leverage state-of-the-art technologies to build outstanding experiences for our users.

You are responsible for building large applications. You will design and implement clean and robust client side architectures.

You will work with a team of remarkably talented and dedicated designers, researchers and developers to help our clients define and meet their project goals.

Hiring process:

- Talk to our recruiter who knows Javascript and is a former programmer (1h)

- Talk to one of our engineers (1h)

- Day at our office where you work together with us

- Hiring decision

Write a mail with a javascript /css code sample to ginetta-web@gmx.ch
